post:
Cyber Monday is here, and we have some dedicated server sales to go with it!

What sets us apart?
-Juniper only network with new equipment.
-Multi 100Gbps core network (640Gbps Total) with N+1 resiliency at minimum and diverse routing.
-Great peering at LINX, LONAP, AMS-IX, DE-CIX and all major local ISP’s.
-We transit with: Level3, Telia, NTT, GTT, TATA, ZAYO and Cogent which guarantees excellent, congestion free connectivity.
-LINX and LONAP partner - we can connect you to these exchanges with your own ASN.
-EU MPLS Network Spread over 7 datacenters.
-Tier 3 Datacentres in London, Amsterdam & Frankfurt.
-We aim at high quality for a reasonable price.
-Clouvider is an established UK based business. We just turned 6!

So where are the offers?
Current offers can be seen at https://www.clouvider.co.uk/dedicated-servers-sale , subject to availability. If it’s not listed its sold! No promotional codes needed.

You can order from https://clouvider.co.uk/dedicated-servers-sale/ , if the configuration is not listed then it has already sold. No RAM/Disk changes possible on the above configurations, IPv4 and IPv6 subnets available. Deployment is within 3 working days.

FAQ’s:

Can these servers be customised?
Pre-configured servers configuration cannot be altered, aside from IPv4 & IPv6 Subnets.
For E-2xxx servers we have several options during the checkout process.

Can I check your network?
Yes, our LookingGlass can be found at https://as62240.net/, alternatively you can use the following test IP’s:
185.42.223.63 - London, UK
194.127.172.33 - Amsterdam, NL
91.199.118.14 - Frankfurt, DE

How long for deployment?
Our standard delivery is within 3 working days. Custom configurations may take longer and E series orders in London are due within 7 working days due to the expected order levels.

Do you offer IPv6?
Yes, /64 or /48 subnets can be requested during the order process.

Can you accommodate x, y or z?
Open a sales ticket to discuss our custom/bespoke solutions, happy to help where possible.

Any questions or queries?
Contact our team today at https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/.

All prices are exclusive of VAT where applicable. Stock is limited and the offers are valid subject to stock remaining. Because of the limited stock, if the order is not paid within an hour, it will be regretfully cancelled and the stock returned to the pool for others to enjoy. Subject to our standard Terms & Conditions

https://www.clouvider.co.uk/terms-conditions. Cancellation notice period applies.
